messages.subject: mystery photo, and apology

messages.messageBody:
http://sandradodd.blogspot.com

Something philosophical/mushy I wrote yesterday, and a mystery photo.


I've had a different couple of weeks--busy and good and stressful and
weird. I wanted to apologize because I'm about to be away from home
for eight days (conference in Minnesota and visiting with Kelli
Traaseth's family), and there are things I had on my list to do that
won't be finished. I have some good comments from Betsy to add to
the unschooling panel responses that followed on the HSC conference.
I meant to send some wolf stuff to a little girl; that will happen
but not so soon. For the connections stuff, I mean to add some pages
to my website (and thanks for the photos I was sent yesterday).

When the webpages are finished, sometime in October I hope, they'll
be announced two places:

http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/

and

on an e-mail list which can be subscribed to (for those who prefer e-
mail to blogs) by sending an e-mail to
SandraDodd-subscribe@yahoogroups.com

or going to
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/sandradodd/

If anyone has a good connections story to share, or a blogpost I
might link to when I get that going, please let me know. For now,
there are some older things already online at http://sandradodd.com/
connections (halfway down that page other peoples stories are).

Sandra
